entries.meaning: A eunuch in South Asia, especially one who dresses as a woman. [from 19th c.]
examples: When the Mughal court was disbanded, Muslim hijras were exposed for the first time to the other, Hindu, tradition of eunuchry.

entries.meaning: A (typically biologically male or intersex, but sometimes biologically female) member of a somewhat feminine third gender found in India and Pakistan.
examples: The subjects of this study are hijras or the "third sex" of India, individuals who occupy a unique, liminal space between male and female, sacred and profane.

description: From Arabic هِجْرَة‎ (hijra, “departure, exodus”). Doublet of hegira.

entries.meaning: Any similar flight or emigration to a better place.
(Islam) Emigration from a non-Muslim country to a Muslim one.
